description_html:
Multiple clear crystal accents hang among the eight lights of this glamorous brushed steel foyer pendant. Large concentric oval rings make up the metal frame. In the center are eight candelabra style lights. The clear crystal accents dangle over the bulb light from arc arms, creating a sophisticated sparkle.

• 31 1/2" wide x 23" high.
• Canopy is 5" wide x 3/4" high.
• Weighs 8 lbs.
• Includes 6-feet of chain, 12-feet of wire.
• Sloped ceiling adaptable.
• Uses eight maximum 60 watt or equivalent type B bulbs (not included).
• Brushed steel finish frame.
• Clear crystal accents.
product_name: Tiller Brushed Steel Pendant Chandelier by Possini Euro Design
